alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 01 at 1:50PM MST until March 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 55 mph, with gusts up to 85 mph, are expected. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong winds will also cause blowing and drifting snow, particularly along and west of the United States Highway 89 corridor from Choteau to the International Border.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
